description: This trap indicates that the CAS Service Group was put in service
by maintenance staff.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SONUS-CAS-MIB::sonusCasSvcGrpInServiceNotification SONUS-CAS-MIB::sonusCasSvcGrpName s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel i 4

description: Name of the CAS service group.
variables.name: SONUS-CAS-MIB::sonusCasSvcGrpName

description: A description of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription

description: The category of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass

description: The severity level of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel

description: This trap indicates that the CAS Service Group was taken out of
service by maintenance staff.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SONUS-CAS-MIB::sonusCasSvcGrpOutOfServiceNotification SONUS-CAS-MIB::sonusCasSvcGrpName s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel i 1

description: Name of the CAS service group.
variables.name: SONUS-CAS-MIB::sonusCasSvcGrpName

description: A description of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription

description: The category of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass

description: The severity level of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel

description: This trap indicates that a CAS channel was put in service by CAS.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SONUS-CAS-MIB::sonusCasChannelInServiceNotification SONUS-CAS-MIB::sonusCasSvcGrpName s EXAMPLE SONUS-CAS-MIB::sonusCassgChannelShelfIndex i 9999 SONUS-CAS-MIB::sonusCassgChannelSlotIndex i 9999 SONUS-CAS-MIB::sonusCassgChannelPortIndex i 9999 SONUS-CAS-MIB::sonusCassgChannelIndex i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel i 4

description: Name of the CAS service group.
variables.name: SONUS-CAS-MIB::sonusCasSvcGrpName

description: The shelf in which the channel is contained
variables.name: SONUS-CAS-MIB::sonusCassgChannelShelfIndex

description: The slot in which the channel is contained
variables.name: SONUS-CAS-MIB::sonusCassgChannelSlotIndex

description: The port in which the channel is contained
variables.name: SONUS-CAS-MIB::sonusCassgChannelPortIndex

description: The relative channel number within the port
variables.name: SONUS-CAS-MIB::sonusCassgChannelIndex

description: A description of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription

description: The category of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass

description: The severity level of the event that generated the trap.
variables.name: SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel

description: This trap indicates that a channel was taken out of service by
the CAS SG due to signaling errors exceeding a configured
threshold.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD SONUS-CAS-MIB::sonusCasChannelOutOfServiceNotification SONUS-CAS-MIB::sonusCasSvcGrpName s EXAMPLE SONUS-CAS-MIB::sonusCassgChannelShelfIndex i 9999 SONUS-CAS-MIB::sonusCassgChannelSlotIndex i 9999 SONUS-CAS-MIB::sonusCassgChannelPortIndex i 9999 SONUS-CAS-MIB::sonusCassgChannelIndex i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventDescription s EXAMPLE SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventClass i 1 SONUS-COMMON-MIB::sonusEventLevel i 1

description: Name of the CAS service group.
variables.name: SONUS-CAS-MIB::sonusCasSvcGrpName

description: The category of the event that generated the trap.
